column1: #Text=Sokka says : " I thought you were crazy at first , Katara , but this might work .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do you remember your cue ?
#Text=You 're taking all the fun out of this .
#Text=" Sokka says : " By this , do you mean intentionally being captured by a group of ruthless firebenders ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Get out of my way , pipsqueak !
#Text=" Katara says : " How dare you call me pipsqueak , you giant - eared cretin !
#Text=" Sokka says : " What did you call me ?
#Text=" Katara says : " A giant - eared cretin !
#Text=Do herds of animals use them for shade ?!
#Text=" Sokka says : " You better back off !
#Text=" Katara says : " I will not back off !
#Text=I bet elephants get together and make fun of how large your ears are !
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'll show you who 's boss !
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , you idiot , it 's the girl !
#Text=You 've got twelve hours to find Haru .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Momo , you have some big ears !
#Text=" Sokka says : " She 'll be fine , Aang .
#Text=It is my pleasure to welcome you aboard my modest shipyard .
#Text=I prefer to think of you not as prisoners , but as honored guests .
#Text=And I hope you come to think of me as your humble and caring host .
#Text=You will succeed here , if you simply abide - " Warden says : " What kind of guest dishonors his host by interrupting him ?!
#Text=One week in solitary will improve his manners .
#Text=Simply treat me with the courtesy that I give you - " Warden says : " And we 'll get along famously .
#Text=" Warden says : " You will notice , earthbenders , that this rig is made entirely of metal .
#Text=You are miles away from any rock or earth .
#Text=So , if you have any illusions about employing that brutish savagery that passes for bending among you people ... forget them .
